mapper.select: select a.title, b.name as writer, a.hit, a.reg_date as regDate, a.depth, a.no, b.no as writerNo from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by a.g_no desc, a.o_no desc
select a.title, a.contents as content, a.g_no, a.o_no, a.depth, b.no as writerNo from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and a.no =#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board values (null, #{title}, #{content}, 0, now(), ((select max(a.g_no) from board a)+1), 1, 0, #{writerNo})
mapper.delete: delete a from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and a.no = #{no} and b.password = password(#{password})
